sentences.sContent: Plan a weekend to go out with friends to barbecue countryside, see a film, play electronic games, play footaball or barly take a walk together.
sentences.sContent_eng: Plan a weekend to go out with friends to barbecue countryside, see a film, play electronic games, play footaball or barly take a walk together.
sentences.sCn: 安排个周末跟朋友一起，一起去野外烧烤、看电影、玩电子游戏、踢足球、或者只是一起走走。

sentences.sContent: You are calling your friend to see if he/she wants to go to see a film.
sentences.sContent_eng: You are calling your friend to see if he/she wants to go to see a film.
sentences.sCn: 你打电话问你的朋友他/她是否想去看电影。

sentences.sContent: By the way, would you like to see a film with me tomorrow?A new film is on at the Capital Cinema.
sentences.sContent_eng: By the way, would you like to see a film with me tomorrow?A new film is on at the Capital Cinema.
sentences.sCn: 顺便问一下，明天你愿不愿意和我一起去看电影? 首都电影院在上演一部新片。
